Rulings.Tengu:
● If there is a Machine in your GY, and you control a Zombie and a Machine, only the Machine gains the ATK.
● If there are no monsters in your GY, no ATK is gained.

Rulings.Base: 1. If non-Zombie-Type monsters in the GY are being treated as Zombie-Type due to "Zombie World" the ATK boost will not apply.\n2. If you only have Warrior-Type monsters in your GY and non-Warrior-Type monsters on the field are being treated as Warrior-Type by "DNA Surgery", the ATK boost will apply to the monsters on the field.

PSCT.Tengu: ① While there is only 1 original Type of monster in your GY, monsters you control with that Type gain 800 ATK.
